title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.737 - Pipe-type and bottle-type gas holders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.737 - Pipe-type and bottle-type gas holders

State Regulations

Whenever a pipe-type or bottle-type gas holder is found, it shall be removed or abandoned unless specific approval is granted for its
continued use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.737

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
